text:
I'll attach a patch that sets the build.compiler.emacs default value to true 
when running with -emacs command line option.  I found some oldish discussion 
about this at  
<http://www.mail-archive.com/ant-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg03202.html>. 
 
While I was at it (documenting this change), the patch contains some typo and 
HTML fixes to the FAQ as well as the javac task manual page. 
 
The patch is agains current CVS HEAD.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi

text: Added to the FAQ together with Bug 11057
creator: bodewig@apache.org
